review: I love all the shows on Netflix that I can watch now,,, but the fire stick needs an on off button because it freezes up and I have to shut everything down
author: renee varelli

review: Awesome product, I specially like the 5ghz wireless compatibility. After a full month we have not had one issue since we plugged it in.
author: James A Nangano

review: Love it! So easy to use and set- up.
author: Fohs Knows

review: No need for renting any Dvd's...it's all here!!  We love the ease of use and the simplicity of it all!!
author: M. Koch "melo mom"

review: Love it!!  I would recommend it to all movie buffs.
author: K. Sheldon "Renovators"

review: The price is nice, it takes about five minutes to set up, and accesses numerous channels, most importantly to me Amazon instant video and Netflix.
author: Lamplighter "Ray out west"

review: Like our Fire stck.  A lot. We couldn't make full use of our Prime membership with TIVO, so now we can.One request would be to add EWTN to the apps. I know they don't charge. Rocky has it, but I went with Amazon, please add EWTN.  Then I will be thrilled
author: Denise A. Mullarkey
